participant_1.background:
I can be myself at work because my coworkers are all really accepting.
i like horseback riding.
I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax.
I like to eat food from my parents' home country.
summer is my favorite season.

participant_2.background:
I like to travel and I'm comfortable in my boots.
my favorite movie is pretty woman.
I grew up in the country, where there was plenty of land to grow sunflowers.
I love my green tea set
I find it relaxing to create beautiful things with my hands.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do in the summer?
I love to travel and see new places. I'm comfortable in my boots and I'm always up for an adventure.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to relax and watch CSI. I live with my pug and he's always happy to see me.
Awww, pugs are so cute! I grew up in the country and there was plenty of land to grow sunflowers. I love my green tea set and I find it relaxing to create beautiful things with my hands.
That sounds like a lovely childhood. I love to eat food from my parents' home country. Summer is my favorite season because it's the perfect time to go horseback riding.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been horseback riding before. Do you have a favorite horse?
I used to ride a horse named Shadow. He was a very gentle horse and he always made me feel safe.
That's a great name for a horse! I'm glad you had a good experience horseback riding.
Me too! It's a really fun activity. Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Mittens. She's a very sweet cat and she loves to cuddle.
Aww, cats are so cute! I love to cuddle with my pug.
I'm glad you have such a cute pet. It sounds like you have a lot of fun hobbies.
Thanks! I try to stay busy and have fun. I'm glad I met you!
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
